SELECT SJL.PLNT_CD, SP.PLNT_NM, SJL.ACSS_IDX, SJL.ACSS_DIV, SJL.ACSS_UID, SU.USER_NM, SJL.ACSS_DS, SJL.ACSS_IP FROM SY_JNT_LOG SJL LEFT JOIN SY_PLNT SP on SJL.PLNT_CD = SP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU on SJL.PLNT_CD = SU.PLNT_CD AND SJL.ACSS_UID = SU.USER_LOGN_ID WHERE SP.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND UPPER(SP.PLNT_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{plntNm}) || '%'
AND UPPER(SU.USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{userNm}) || '%'
AND UPPER(SJL.ACSS_UID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{acssUid}) || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(TO_CHAR(SJL.ACSS_DS, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{acssDsList[0]}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{acssDsList[1]}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
ORDER BY ACSS_DS DESC
